EmailTemplate.subject: Extend Your Trial License | Thank You V-Much
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
THANK YOU FOR TRYING VMTURBO. Want to Extend Your Trial License?
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thanks for giving us a shot. Your 30-Day trial has come and gone, and we hope you have found VMTurbo useful.
If you didn't have time to fully evaluate or implement VMTurbo, simply contact us and we will grant you an extended license key <http://bit.ly/1gHVfGN>.
We are ever grateful for your time and trust, and look forward to hearing from you
Your IT control system, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
